```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rethinking)
library(cmdstanr)
library(posterior)
library(bayesplot)
library(broom)
color_scheme_set("brightblue")

```

```{r}
d = list(
  N = 10000,
  drops_wt = rep(1, 10000),
  drops_mut=c(rep(0, 9999),1)
)
mod = cmdstan_model('m1.stan')
mod$print()

fit <- mod$sample(
  data = d, 
  seed = 123, 
  chains = 4, 
  parallel_chains = 4,
  refresh = 500
)
```
```{r}
stanfit <- rstan::read_stan_csv(fit$output_files())
precis(stanfit)
precis(stanfit)[3,3:4] %>% exp
```
